column4: does anyone have any good advice for guide in learning command promt
There's nothing to a command prompt; you type a command, it runs it. You just need to know what commands exist :)
rpm's are Red Hat Package Management files.
but you usually shouldn't be installing from them; better to install from the repos directly (IMHO)
didn't the zsnes package in the repos work? Did you try that first?
which pakacge is synaptic do i have to install to access zsnes
you need to enable multiverse; just a sec I'll tell you how to do that --
did you read that link ubotu sent you? (Or just look at http://wiki.ubuntu.com/AddingRepositoriesHowto )
i am reading the link now
i found a gameboy advance repository but not an zsnes one
i only found a gameboy advance repository but not an zsnes one
a package called zsnes is there in multiverse; do an update (or "Refresh"?) and search again
